subject: Meeting Request
body:
Hi team,

I would like to schedule a meeting to discuss the Q2 project timeline. Please let me know your availability for this week.

Best regards,
John
label: meeting_request

subject: Project Update
body:
Dear stakeholders,

I'm pleased to inform you that we've completed Phase 1 of the project ahead of schedule. Here are the key milestones achieved:
1. Infrastructure setup
2. Initial testing
3. Documentation

Next steps will be shared in our weekly meeting.

Regards,
Sarah
label: project_update

subject: Follow-up on Invoice
body:
Hello,

I'm writing to follow up on invoice #12345 which was due last week. Could you please confirm when we can expect the payment?

Thank you,
Mike
label: payment_followup

subject: Thank You Note
body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for your help with the presentation yesterday. Your insights were invaluable!

Best,
Emma
label: thank_you

subject: Client Proposal
body:
Dear Mr. Smith,

Thank you for considering our services. Attached is our detailed proposal for the marketing campaign.

Key highlights:
- 3-month campaign duration
- Social media strategy
- Analytics and reporting

We look forward to your feedback.

Best regards,
Marketing Team
label: proposal
